Totally agree and was only taking about this last week a focus on wages as the measure of University education is fundementally missing the point of University education.

Linda Drew, the vice-chancellor of Ravensbourne - the UK‚Äôs newest university - warned that using graduate salaries to measure the success of higher education is a ‚Äúcold, grim way‚Äù of looking at it. She argued that the current government emphasis on Stem subjects neglects the fact that many industrial and tech companies value input from the arts and humanities for the new, creative perspectives they bring.

Albums are a thing

My good friend has Spotify & I have Apple Music I have to have the Spotify iOS app to be able to send her links to records I think she would like, this is pretty terrible due to no open options, and no scripts via IFTTT or workflow to do a search and convert are available. But wow recently opening Spotify it is totally confusing if you want to share a record/ LP its all about playlists from what I can tell.

Thankfully Apple Music has not gone down this route. I think the Album is important and the order selected by the Artist is important that‚Äôs how I want to hear my music so please Apple if your doing one thing well in Apple Music it is by ensuring Albums are a thing. Thank you. üéß
